description: In a post-apocalyptic world overrun with mutated beasts called Limbeekoon or Filth Monsters, humanity is forced to live in large mobile cities called Regios and learn to use special weapons called Dite, by harnessing the power of Kei to defend themselves. In the Academy City of Zuellni, Layfon Alseif is hoping to start a new life and forget his past. However, his past has caught the attention of Karian Loss, the manipulative Student Council President and Nina Antalk, a Military Arts student and Captain of the 17th Military Arts Platoon, who instantly recognizes his abilities and decides he’s the perfect candidate to join her group. However, with a secret past that won’t leave him alone and unknown powers beyond normal, Layfon just might not take it.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

node.description:
**Height:** 151.6 cm

[Official Website](https://www.takagakiayahi.com/) | [Music Ray'n profile](https://musicrayn.com/takagaki_ayahi) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/takagakiayahi-blog/)

Ayahi Takagaki graduated from a Tokyo music college majoring in operatic singing. Her professionally trained operatic voice can be heard in songs like "Life", "Inori" or "Justice".

One of the members of Seiyuu Group, [Sphere](https://anilist.co/staff/103636).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Aloy - Genshin Impact

Gender: Male

Japanese novelist, author of popular Chrome Shelled Regios (Koukaku no Regios) series.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sy_amagi)

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

__[Website](http://www.danet.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daisukeasakura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daisuke_asakura/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/daisukeasakura.official)__

__Birthplace:__ Taito Ward, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Kuramae Technical High School

__Daisuke Asakura__, alternatively known as DA, is a Japanese vocalist, music producer, orchestrator, composer and arranger.

__[Website](http://www.danet.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daisukeasakura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daisuke_asakura/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/daisukeasakura.official)__

__Birthplace:__ Taito Ward, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Kuramae Technical High School

__Daisuke Asakura__, alternatively known as DA, is a Japanese vocalist, music producer, orchestrator, composer and arranger.

__[Website](http://www.danet.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daisukeasakura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daisuke_asakura/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/daisukeasakura.official)__

__Birthplace:__ Taito Ward, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Kuramae Technical High School

__Daisuke Asakura__, alternatively known as DA, is a Japanese vocalist, music producer, orchestrator, composer and arranger.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

[Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/daisy-daisy-mika/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DaisyxDaisy) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEmgOQ1-kqy6bJD4KnzjHTg)

Daisy × Daisy is a project of female artist MiKA (近藤みか, Kondō Mika). Daisy × Daisy has released 5 singles (3 maxi singles) and an album titled 『Genesis & Rebirth』, released on October 3rd, 2008, and consists of 12 tracks. The single, 『Brave your truth』 is the opening theme of a TV anime series, Chrome Shelled Regios, while 『HOLY SHINE』 is the ending theme for Fairy Tail.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
